name: Keroch Inc.
overview:
Keroch, Inc. is a private equity search fund that seeks out and acquires niche internet businesses. Post-acquisition, Keroch works operationally to grow traffic, improve monetization, and increase user engagement for its portfolio websites.

A small and dedicated team, Kerochâ€™s four partners possess 30+ years of combined experience in the technology/internet industry ranging from large companies such as Yahoo! to small start-ups.

Located in the heart of Silicon Valley, they are poised to grow portfolio companies by executing consumer internet expertise and leveraging network.

milestones.source_description: Mystery PE Fund Throws A Lifeline To Niche Social Network Sneakerplay

external_links.title: PE Fund Throws A Lifeline To Niche Social Network Sneakerplay
